en.content: You get to your feet and back away towards the daylight. Arbogast gives a savage smile as he sees you go.
“Another who will not dare to listen. Frightened of truth. I will offer you one last piece of advice.”
Daylight burns across that scarred face, crouched in the subterranean shadow.

zh.content: 你直起身来，向后退到阳光下。阿博加斯特看着你退出，狂野地微笑。
“又是个不敢听下去的家伙。被真相吓坏了。我给你最后一条忠告吧。”
他蹲在地下的阴影里，阳光灼到他布满伤疤的脸上。
